latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Passed inspection with no violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was observed in the child care service that a bathroom/closet or other enclosed space has a locking mechanism solely operable from inside the space
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection floors/walls ceilings were observed not maintained in disrepair or covered in a toxic finish
Child care service failed to arrange/conduct criminal/SCR background clearance checks for required individuals failed to re-clear required individuals with the SCR every two years
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service allows staff to perform their duties that are not healthy or are incapable of carrying out their duties Staff medical clearances are not maintained by child care service
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service failed to ensure staff received required training within time frames and/or failed to maintain training records
All teachers have not received training in infectious disease control and reporting
Child care service providing care without a staff member trained in First Aid/CPR on site at time of inspection
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection hand wash sinks are not supplied with an adequate amount of running water At time of inspection water temperature exceeded 115 deg Fahrenheit
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service providing care without a staff member trained in First Aid/CPR on site at time of inspection
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection hand wash sinks are not supplied with an adequate amount of running water At time of inspection water temperature exceeded 115 deg Fahrenheit
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations
